scenario_text.value:
(In an instant, all of us had been sent out
of the underground waterway.)

(Just like before. This must be some weird
power that ghost boy possesses.)
Man, what a beeyootiful day!

Nothing like a little sunshine to put some
pep in your step!

This is...the south side of the waterway! We
can head right back to the school!

Hooray! Let’s hurry on back! I’m ready to
pass out.

The sun’s gonna set pretty soon, from the
looks of things.
Yes, we should head back immediately.
Come on, let’s go, Takuma!

(The origins of this world. The Master’s
identity, and those who care for him.)

(We’ve learned a lot, and gained more tasks
along the way. Finally getting somewhere...)

(Only one shrine left. But before that, our
first break in a long while.)
Okay guys, let’s go...
Back to our home!

My...seeing the professor now, the bond with
your beloved partner is a wonderful thing.

Yeah. Meeting my partner was the greatest
gift I could’ve ever asked for.

Aoi! Let’s go take a break over there... Oh?
Was I interrupting something?
W-what’re you talking about, Labramon?!
Yeah, you, you’re not interrupting!

You two sure are adorable, aren’t you? Makes
me wanna pick on you!
Come on... Don’t tease us, now.

I was only able to protect Miu for this long
thanks to you and the others.

You’re doing your best for her, Kaito. That’s
why she’s safe. You’re a great brother.

Thanks. Still... I know this is the only time
I can protect her like this.

One day she’ll go off on her own, grow up...
And go off with someone she wants to marry...

Whoa, back it up, Kaito! That’s a long way
away. Your expression is freaking me out!

At the very least, I’d feel better if her
partner was a man I could accept...

Uh, why are you staring at me like that?
Seriously, man, chill out!
Takumaaa! Let’s go take a break!
Sure. We should take a little breather.

Nice! In that case, let me sit on your lap
for a minute.

What did you...ah, whoa! Hold on, now! 
Wh-what are you doing?!

Huh? Why, what’s wrong? Did someone else
want to use it?

No, it’s just—jeez, I kinda worry about your
future, Saki...

...You act like a dad sometimes, Takuma.
Hee hee, I bet you’ll be a good one someday!

Hey, Takuma. What will you do when we head
back to our world after this battle?
Hmm... Return to my normal life, I guess?

You know... When this battle’s over, I want
to rethink my future.
Figure out what I really want to do, you know?

Whoa, Shuuji! Don’t talk about things like
that! It’s bad luck!

“When this battle’s over...” Don’t tempt
fate!

*sigh* Where the heck did you get that idea,
Takuma?
Hey, Takuma! Come take a break over here!

Sure, why not? I could use a break. Now let’s
see, where to sit...

...Hey Takuma, got a sec?
Over here.

Uh, what’s up, Kaito? You’re looking kinda
creepy...

You and Miu have sure gotten chummy lately.
I assume that means you’re prepared?

Prepared to call me your brother-in-law!
YOU ARE, AINTCHA?!

Whoa, whoa, WHOA! What’re you saying?!
Calm dow—augh, muh, my neck!

Awww, I guess Kaito wants to hang out with
Takuma. Those two sure do get along.

I’m glad the professor and Garurumon made up.
You gotta get along with your partner, man.

Precisely. Minoru and I have overcome many
things to become the ultimate partners.

Yeah, what he said! And Falcomon’s as much of
a partner to me as Takuma is.
As much...as Takuma?

Falcomon...? Um, your face looks kinda scary
all of a sudden...

Takuma... Face me in battle! We’ll determine
who is truly Minoru’s #1 partner!!!

Huh? There’s no #1 and #2 when it comes to
partners... Ah, wait...stop pecking at me!

Ahahaha... I wish I was this popular with the
ladies.
Kew! Kewkew!
...Oh, I get it. Wanna take a breather?
Wow, it’s like telepathy with you two.

...Now that you mention it, I wonder why
I understand what this guy’s trying to say?

I didn’t get him at all in the beginning.
I just started to understand at one point.
Kewkewkew! Kew!

Even I can understand what he’s saying now.
He thinks you’re the best partner!
...Heh heh, is that right? Fine by me.
